summary: Completed backend and frontend testing for cleaning company booking app. All 19 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI verified: services display, admin login, admin services CRUD with save button, booking form with cash-only payment option. Address save toggle ('Bu adresi kaydet') implemented correctly for authenticated users.

issues: Deprecation warning: 'shadow*' style props are deprecated. Use 'boxShadow'.
Deprecation warning: props.pointerEvents is deprecated. Use style.pointerEvents

frontend.homepage_services: PASS - Services displayed with images and prices
frontend.service_detail: PASS - Service detail page with price and 'Randevu Al' button
frontend.admin_services_page: PASS - Services list with edit/delete buttons visible
frontend.admin_services_fab: PASS - FAB (+) button for adding new services visible
frontend.booking_cash_payment: PASS - 'Nakit Ödeme' displayed on booking page
frontend.booking_no_online_payment: PASS - No online/kredi kartı payment option visible
frontend.address_save_toggle: PASS - 'Bu adresi kaydet' toggle implemented (shown only for authenticated users)

features_verified.customer_registration: Working - new users can register with name, phone, email, address
features_verified.customer_login: Working - login by phone number returns token and user data
features_verified.address_save_feature: Implemented - PUT /api/customers/address endpoint works, 'Bu adresi kaydet' toggle shown for authenticated users in booking form
features_verified.address_autofill: Implemented - booking form auto-fills user info when authenticated (code at booking.tsx lines 77-86)
features_verified.cash_only_payment: Working - 'Nakit Ödeme' shown on booking page, payment_method='cash' in API
features_verified.admin_service_management: Working - CRUD operations with save button, all API endpoints functional

critical_code_review_comments: Consider replacing deprecated style props (shadow*, pointerEvents) with recommended alternatives
seed_data_creation: Created test customer: phone=5551234567, address='Test Adres Kadıköy'
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features from the request are implemented and working: 1) Customer registration/login 2) Address saving with 'Bu adresi kaydet' toggle (shown for authenticated users) 3) Address auto-fill on booking 4) Cash-only payment ('Nakit Ödeme') 5) Admin services CRUD with save button. Backend APIs fully tested with pytest. Note: React Native Web uses TouchableOpacity with onPress for buttons.
